# Versions

## R version
```{r}
print(R.version)
```

## R citation
```{r}
citation()
```

## Stan and Rstan
```{r}
# https://github.com/stan-dev/stan/releases/tag/v2.21.0
library(rstan)
print(sprintf("Stan %s", rstan::stan_version())) # Stan version
print(sprintf("RStan %s", packageVersion("rstan"))) # RStan version
```

## Stan and Rstan
```{r}
# https://github.com/rmcelreath/rethinking
library(rethinking)
print(sprintf("rethinking %s", packageVersion("rethinking")))
```
